title: Definitely Dead
description: "The new Sookie Stackhouse novel from the New York Times bestselling author of Dead as a Doornail. Spiked with a ""frothy fusion of romance, mystery, and fantasy"" (Publishers Weekly), this ""deliciously fiendish...increasingly riotous series"" (Dallas Morning News) sends the supernaturally gifted cocktail waitress to New Orleans, where she has to deal with the legacy of one of her own family and a host of potentially dangerous characters."
author: Charlaine Harris
